name: Heroes of the Monkey Tavern
description: After countless days and nights celebrating within the infamous Monkey Tavern, our team of adventurers have spent every last penny... Their fates, however are about to change...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 GPU ; NVidia GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 5670 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
